page.title: 06BMX Track in Stoke
page.content: In Stoke on Sunday we went down to the BMX (Bicycle motor-cross) track and had lots of fun. First of all we went on the Berm. A{Berm}is a half spoon shape made from dirt. You have the Berm for racing and freestyle. The {Tabletop}is a square with kerbs on front and back. A{Speed Jump}is a hump which you can wheelie over. A{wheelie is lifting the front wheel off the ground and pedalling fast. A{Bomb Hole is a hole which you jump across. The second{Berm}is for freestyle. Moves we can do on the Berm are drop in , ariels, roll back, spin back and kickturn.{Whoops}are two humps together which you can jump or wheelie over. A{BMX Bicycle}is different from an ordinary bicycle. It is stronger. It has a gusset on the handle bars and another on the frame to strengthen it. A{gusset}is a trianguler shape.
